TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopeVersion extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含与 SOAP 版本相关的信息，该版本与消息及其交换关联。

span.span: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前可用的 SOAP 版本为 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 每个可以使用 和 属性恢复的 SOAP 版本都具有一个 。There is an for each of these versions of SOAP that can be recovered using the and properties. 此外，还有一个 消息版本可用于收发不使用 SOAP 格式的 XML 消息。There is also a message version that is used to sent and receive XML messages that do not use SOAP formatting. 与每个消息版本关联的处理角色可以使用 属性和 方法进行恢复。The processing roles associated with each message version can be recovered using the property and the method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何访问 的方法和属性。The following code shows how to access the methods and properties of . [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetUltimateDestinationActorValues() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含与最终目标的当前消息版本关联的 SOAP 角色的 URI 名称。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.

returns.span: 如果使用 SOAP1.1，则为空字符串；如果使用 SOAP1.2，则为包含 http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver 的字符串。

span.span: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定了 `null`，最终接收方将为 。The ultimate receiver is `null` if is specified. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NextDestinationActorValue As String
public: property System::String ^ NextDestinationActorValue { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含与下一目标的当前消息版本关联的 SOAP 角色的 URI 名称。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next使用 SOAP1.1; 如果包含一个字符串http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next使用 SOAP1.2; 如果和空字符串如果消息版本为无。

span.span: A string that contains http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next if SOAP1.2 is used; and an empty string if the message version is none.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ None { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取不使用 SOAP 版本的信封版本。

span.span: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.

value.span: 不使用 SOAP 格式的信封版本。

span.span: The envelope version not using a SOAP formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用的是 消息版本，这意味着没有写出 SOAP 信封，并且消息发出了正文内容。If the message version is used this means that a SOAP envelope is not written out and the message emits the contents of the body. 这使 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 通道与所需 XML 与任何格式设置的 SOAP 终结点进行通信。This enables an Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) channel to communicate with an endpoint that is expecting XML with no SOAP formatting. XML 负载存在于消息正文中，当它遇到编码器时，只会发出此负载信息。The XML payload lives in the body of a message and is the only thing emitted when it hits the encoder. 同样，当收到任意 XML 块时，它都将包装在消息中以便向信道堆栈的上层传播。Similarly, when the arbitrary chunk of XML is received it is wrapped up in a Message for propagation up the channel stack. 将插入所需的标头，并将消息视作 SOAP 消息进行处理。The required headers are inserted and the message is processed as if it had been a SOAP message. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Soap11 As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ Soap11 { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 SOAP1.1 信封版本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回区分区域性的可读字符串。This method returns a human-readable string that is culture-sensitive. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#6)]
